The D.O.T.

I would be saying in a time and place but time is messed up. Ruby, Betty and Bob have destroyed the D.O.T. and they need to get the crystals that make up the D.O.T. But unfortunately, there are others who want to claim the D.O.T as their own. The crystals are scattered across the world. Will they be able to make the D.O.T in time before time is completely destroyed? Will Ronald Quack get the power to take over world? Will Tyrone get his happy ever after, after everything he has done?
